item-description: While exploring NYC with friends, I visited TheRealReal's SOHO store for the first time. On the lower floor, a unique piece with vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and patchwork instantly grabbed my attention. Its distinctive design would undoubtedly make it a standout addition to my wardrobe. To my delight, the garment draped exactly as I had envisioned. Adding to the allure, a friend mentioned that Harry Styles had worn the same piece during his tour. Immediate purchase.

Cargo trousers are cut to a regular fit with an elasticated waistband, mid-waist and long length. Crafted from ripstop cotton with an irregular faded finish, detailed with cargo and side pockets. Detailed with an Acne Studios logo embroidery. Regular fit | Mid waist | Elasticated waist | Long length | Acne Studios logo embroidery | Side seam and cargo pockets | Main material made from organically grown cotton.

Our short-sleeve Irving shirt is cut for a standard fit and detailed with a point collar, and button-front closures. A style that feels both casual and modern, this version is cut from a premium cotton blend fabric that’s airy and maintains a polished appearance.

A tailored style with minimal detailing, our Sylvain shirt is designed with a structured point collar, and a longer hem that easily tucks into your pant. Made of an ultra-compact knit with inherent stretch from one of Japan’s finest mills, it's designed for a comfortable, casual feel while still looking sharp. A modern everyday choice, this machine-washable fabric features a wrinkle-resistant construction for optimum shape retention throughout the day.

Slim fit. The knitted fabric structure makes this shirt ultra comfortable & stretchy, while repelling stains & odour. The sealed Ascolite® button thread ensures you’ll never lose a button. Originally developed in collaboration with Kenneth Perez. It is stain repellent, odour repellent, wrinkle free, planet friendly, stretch cotton. John Elliott Season Eight Peacoat, Collar, Slit Pockets & Button Closure

Our most versatile cool-to-cold-weather layer. The Heavyweight Overshirt works great as a shirt, as an easy light jacket, or as a warm mid-layer under a coat. Plus, the 8 oz heavy cotton twill is durable, warm, and twice as heavy as our Japanese Oxford cloth. Overshirt, over-sweater, under-jacket—your call.
Great for everything from recovery days at home to weekend workouts at the gym, the women's adidas Future Icons 3-Stripes crew sweatshirt has you covered with a relaxed fit and casual feel.

Our standout sustainable Dirt Collection has dug up a new addition to the line: the Dirt Coverall. It feels like a soft, well-worn piece straight off the shelf, and the spandex gives just the right amount of stretch in the areas that need it to not hold you back. Being covered in dirt never looked so good, or felt so comfortable. Features & Specs | Midweight stretch twill organic cotton | Two front drop in hand pockets | Two back pockets | Enzymed washed | Sustainably garment-dyedWRAP certified production. Meeting fair labor standards for the safety, health, and wellness of employees. Responsibly-sourced organic cotton. Garment dyed process resulting in 95% less water consumption. GreenScreen Certified™ chemicals. Advanced e-Flow technology minimizes overall environmental impact by reducing energy usage, chemical use, material waste and wastewater.
Polo-style waistcoat with V-neck, sleeveless, openwork diamond structure and ribbed finish.

Acne Studios denim blue printed scarf is crafted from silk with a crinkled finish. Printed | Crinkled finish | Measurements: 26 cm x 127 cm | Style ID: FN-UX-SCAR000311

babes, these pants are the only thing that you need! Made from the highest quality cotton twill, these pants are gonna show off your crack better than any plumber could!!we're a diff breed of sustainable, genderless and Australian made clothing. We’re committing right now to manufacturing our garments right here in Australia. This way we’ll have more control over doing our bit to support other local businesses. This way we’ll have more control over where the swing tags, woven labels, and fabrics are coming from. This way we’ll have more control over how much waste is being created and how it's been recycled. This way we’ll have more control over the quality of our brand. This way we’ll have more control over ensuring our environment is protected.

Small and packable, this ultralight jacket is windproof and water-resistant. Take it hiking, cycling and running – or keep it in your backpack for a rainy day. | Key features | Weight: 61g | Windproof, water-resistant and practically weightless | Slightly fitted sleeve and bottom hems | Treated with a PFOS-free durable water repellent | Constructed with extremely lightweight materials | Stretchable mesh vents under both arms
item-fabric: Main: 100% Recycled Polyamide; Insert: 80% Polyamide, 20% Elastane

item-description: Knit cotton- and nylon-blend vest. Rib knit V-neck, cropped hem, and armscyes. Logo hardware at back collar.

Heavyweight cotton twill cargo pants. Features: Belt loops, Cord-lock drawstring at waistband, Four-pocket styling, Zip-fly, Darts at front waistband and cuffs, Cargo pocket at outseams, Unlined | As the brainchild of Japanese design veteran Keizo Shimizu, clothing label NEEDLES connotes a highly referential yet ultimately singular vision of menswear. Operating as Tokyo’s best-kept-secret before infiltrating New York City via the Shimizu-helmed Nephethens store, the brand freely integrates style cues from both cultures in equal measure. Shimizu’s early-life affinity for Ivy-league deadstock translates into off-kilter collegiate pieces, which are injected with a welcomed sense of unfamiliarity. Given his background at Nephethens, Shimizu approaches design from a retailer’s viewpoint, assembling collections that touch on a variety of styles while maintaining an air of calcultated curation. This stylistic patchwork gives way to multi-textile constructions that defy the rigidity of retrograde American menswear, offering an unexpected warmth to NEEDLES’s cross-cultural collage.
